SEARCH
Package repository.interfaces

Interface IRepository<T extends BaseModel>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the model that the repository is storing.
All Known Subinterfaces:
IAdminRepository, IAppointmentRepository, IDoctorRepository, IInventoryRepository, IMedicalRecordRepository, IPatientRepository, IPharmacistRepository, IUserRepository
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdminRepository, AppointmentRepository, BaseRepository, DoctorRepository, InventoryRepository, MedicalRecordRepository, PatientRepository, PharmacistRepository, UserRepository
public interface IRepository<T extends BaseModel>
The interface that defines the behavaiour of a data repository of a BaseModel. Each implementation of repositories of models must implement this interface.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    clear()
    Removes all the items in the repository and persist the changes.
    int
    count()
    Gets the total number of items stored by the IRepository.

    Removes the item that matches the given ID and persist the changes.

    Checks whether an item matching the given ID exists in the repository.

    Gets all the items stored by the IRepository.

    Finds all the items that matches a given predicate (condition).
    T
    findById(String id)
    Finds the item that matches the given ID.
    String
    generateId()
    Generates a unique ID for the item to be stored in the repository.
    Map<String,T>
    getItems()
    Gets the items that are being stored by the IRepository where each entry of items is key-value pair, in which the key corresponds to the ID of the item, see BaseModel.getId().
    List<T>
    save(List<T> collection)
    Saves a collection of items to the repository.
    T
    save(T item)
    Saves the given item to the repository.

  • Method Details

    • getItems

      Map<String,T> getItems()
      Gets the items that are being stored by the IRepository where each entry of items is key-value pair, in which the key corresponds to the ID of the item, see BaseModel.getId().
      Returns:
      The items being held by the repository.

    • findAll

      List<T> findAll()
      Gets all the items stored by the IRepository.
      Returns:
      a list of all the items.

    • count

      int count()
      Gets the total number of items stored by the IRepository.
      Returns:
      The number of items held by the repository.

    • findById

      T findById(String id)
      Finds the item that matches the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the item.
      Returns:
      the item matching the ID.

    • findBy

      List<T> findBy(Predicate<T> predicate)
      Finds all the items that matches a given predicate (condition).
      Parameters:
      predicate - the condition to check whether an item should be included.
      Returns:
      a list of the items satisfying the predicate.

    • exists

      boolean exists(String id)
      Checks whether an item matching the given ID exists in the repository.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the item.
      Returns:
      whether or not the item with such ID exists.

    • exists

      boolean exists(Predicate<T> predicate)
      Checks whether an item matching the given predicate (condition) exists in the repository.
      Parameters:
      predicate - the predicate (condition) to check against.
      Returns:
      whether or not the item matching the predicate exists.

    • save

      T save(T item)
      Saves the given item to the repository.
      Parameters:
      item - the item with changes to be saved.
      Returns:
      the same reference to the item.

    • save

      List<T> save(List<T> collection)
      Saves a collection of items to the repository.
      Parameters:
      collection - the collection of items to be saved.
      Returns:
      the same reference to the items.

    • deleteById

      T deleteById(String id)
      Removes the item that matches the given ID and persist the changes.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the item.
      Returns:
      the item that was removed.

    • clear

      void clear()
      Removes all the items in the repository and persist the changes.

    • generateId

      String generateId()
      Generates a unique ID for the item to be stored in the repository.
      Returns:
      the unique ID.
